basics.name: Aleksandr Kim
basics.label: Senior Data Scientist
basics.summary: Experienced Data Scientist with a background in leading projects and teams, and in applying data-backed solutions to complex business issues. My journey has progressed from being an Individual Contributor to a Team Leader, and then to working in a diverse international environment. I am always focused on creating tangible customer-oriented solutions through Data Science, rather than just enhancing ML metrics.

work.name: Intuit (Leading Financial Software Company)
highlights: Leveraged LLMs and classical ML models to enhance UX for millions of online users. Yes, yes, we improved user engament metrics by >30% using LLMs, however, we didn't forget about "classical" ML models.
Improved AB tesing approach for non-IID data and not normaly distributed metrics

work.name: Intuit (Leading Financial Software Company)
highlights: Founded and led Data Science Guild (70+ members)
Optimized a complex data aggregation system using ML, reducing the error rate by 40%

work.name: X5 Retail Group (Top Russian Retailer, about 20k stores)
highlights: Developed promotion optimization system forecasting 100K+ time series daily
Built pricing models for millions of goods
Hired and built my own team while also supporting the hiring of data scientists, data engineers, and data quality specialists for other teams
Organized data quality monitoring for Hive data bases

work.name: Kaspersky Lab (International Cybersecurity Company)

Developed and Deployed language identification model for customer's support (SLA increase + automation)
